title: [Blitzcrank] - Not mutable
body:
Played against a blitzcrank today that was spamming the laugh command.  Muted him, but it didn't have any effect.

HOW TO REPRODUCE:
1. Select Blitzcrank
2. Have anyone mute Blitzcrank
3. Have blitzcrank /laugh

replies.body:
Hey khmarican,

The current functionality of the mute feature is to mute chat and mute the VO of the champion they're using. This doesn't mute SFX or the animation.

Are you still hearing the VO?

Yes, also happened with Kog'Maw and Garen /joke command. 

Besides, if I'm muting blitzcrank, I don't want to hear his SFX either.
this is a good point... why doesn't the sfx get muted as well? i still got lulu laugh and amumu laugh BURNED into my memory (amumu laugh before the patched that creepy glitch)
the time of man has come to an end. ha ha ha ha.
